name: @wgp/game
description: Contains the game client for project Goofy Rockets

scripts.debug: nodemon --watch src --ext js,ts,json --watch .env --delay 80ms --exec 'tsc && cross-env NODE_ENV=development node --inspect=0.0.0.0:9229 dist/index.js'
scripts.dev: cross-env nodemon --watch .env --delay 80ms --watch src --ext js,ts,json --exec 'cross-env NODE_ENV=development ts-node src/index.ts'
